content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max. I hope you're doing well. The apartment is indeed in Magdeburg and it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for the highest possible rent, so feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment's location and condition, I offer 600 euros per month for the rental.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for more. I'm sure you understand that a prime location like this, in a newly built apartment, has a considerable worth. I suggest 800 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, the apartment is unfurnished and its size is relatively small. Considering these factors, I think 700 euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 700 euros per month seems a bit low for the prime location and new construction of the apartment. I suggest 750 euros per month, and that's my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 euros per month is a fair price for an unfurnished, small apartment. Considering the apartment's location and condition, I was expecting a higher rent. However, since you are a student and I want to maintain a good relationship with my tenants, I accept your offer of 750 euros per month. 'I agree to the price of [750] Euro!'
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 'I agree to the price of [750] Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
